page.title: 13ADULT LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
Hermitage and Oare Women's Institute Hermitage Mother and Toddler Club Hermitage Horticultural Society Compton Badminton Club Hermitage Conservative Association Yattendon and Frilsham Cricket Club Hermitage Cricket Club Newbury and Crookham Golf Club Freewheelers Newbury Air Training Corps Curridge Women's Institute Greenacres Squash Club Cold Ash Tennis Club Newbury Rugby Club Wine Circle Pelican Health and Fitness Club Newbury National Housewives Register
This list of clubs was compiled from a questionnaire asking people in Hermitage and Curridge what societies they belong to.
